CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...9. The artistic Adair California Wine booth was graced beautifully by Miss Margaret Amaker...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Margaret Amaker holding bottle of wine in front of Adair California Wine booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
